mapper.insert: insert into access_history (USERID, IP, BROWSER, OPERATING_SYSTEM) values (#{userid}, #{ip}, #{browser}, #{operatingSystem})
insert into login_history (USERID, IP, STATUS) values (#{userId}, #{ip}, #{status})
insert into LOGIN(id, AGE_RANGE) values (#{id}, #{ageRange}) on duplicate key update AGE_RANGE = values(AGE_RANGE)
